title: Keycloak 21.1.2 released
content: To download the release go to .   MIGRATION FROM 21.0  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database. If you are not on the previous release refer to for a complete list of migration changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Avoid using user property mapper when resolving root user attributes keycloak   BUGS   * Issue with "User-Initiated Action Lifespan" keycloak admin/ui  * Vulnerable packages and or dependencies found in keycloak 21.0.1 quarkus    distribution keycloak dist/quarkus  * CVE-2022-1471 keycloak dependencies  * Cannot set initial password for new users when using a custom UserFederation    keycloak  * SAML Encryption: Missing Support for http://www.w3.org/2009/xmlenc11#rsa-oaep    keycloak saml  * Keycloak issues on edge and after chrome upgarde to 112 (with experimental    features) keycloak oidc  * Enabling Dynamic Scope missing in UI keycloak admin/ui  * Incorrect function is used in 'keycloak-admin-client' library in getToken    function keycloak adapter/javascript  * Saving client admin-cli in master realm gives a javascript error keycloak    admin/ui  * Paginating on the group tree view doesn't work keycloak admin/ui  * Dropdown options on Documentation pointing to 21.1 endpoint instead of latest    and throwing 404 when clicking on it. keycloak docs  * Keycloak 21.1.1: Paging and filtering not working in "Assign roles" popup for    Groups keycloak admin/ui  * Keycloak 21.1.1: filter on Sessions gets stuck keycloak admin/ui  * Processing of env variable references in config file broken keycloak    dist/quarkus  * LDAP Mapper Action Menu Error keycloak admin/ui  * Event-Type: "User info request error" does not work keycloak admin/ui  * Create new user UI: username is not marked with an asterisk keycloak admin/ui  * role filter has no effect on roles list keycloak admin/ui  * required fields don't show errors when user profile is enabled keycloak    account/ui  * OTP devices are not shown in the admin UI keycloak admin/ui  * Test `InternationalizationTest` fails in CI keycloak testsuite  * Deleting a client scope in the Admin UI should redirect to the list of    ClientScopes keycloak admin/ui  * SAML Protocol Mapper's NameIDFormat is null keycloak admin/ui  * Headers is not defined keycloak admin/client-js  * Fix for certificate revalidation keycloak   UPGRADING  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database and check the for anything that may have changed.
